data.title: Godparents
data.meta_description:
Which of the current crown princess have the most godchildren (particularly royal godchildren)?
 
I know Mette-Marit is Prince Christian's godmother but is...
data.text:
I checked on the forum:

Catharina-Amalia - Princess Victoria

Alexia - Princess Mathilde

Ariane - ?

Christian - Princess Victoria

Isabella - Princess Mathilde

Ingrid - Princess Victoria

Sverre - Princess Maxima

I think Princess Victoria has the most godchildren so far! (amongst the crown princely couples)

Of course this is just the ones I can think of and Leonor and Sofia don't have any of the crown princesses as godparents, or the Belgian royal children (I think)

(I suppose it would be easier to list the godparents and their godchildren)

Does anyone know who the godparents were for Crown Prince William of Germany's six children? Especially his two oldest, Wilhelm and Louis Ferdinand?

Prince Wilhelm of Prussia.

Emperor Franz Joseph of Austria

I couldn't find anything for Louis Ferindand or any of his other children.

x

Netherlands.

Crown Prince Couples Children =

Princess Ariane = Valeria Delger, Inés Zorreguieta, Hereditary Grand Duke Guilliame of Luxembourg , Tijo Baron Collot d’Escury, and Anton Friling.

Princess Catharina-Amalia = Her godparents are her uncle Prince Constantijn of the Netherlands, Victoria, Crown Princess of Sweden, Marc ter Haar (her father's friend), Herman-Diederik Tjeenk Willink (Vice-president of the Council of State), Samantha van Welderen Baroness Rengers-Deane (her mother's friend) and her uncle Martín Zorreguieta.

Princess Alexia = Princess Mathilde, Duchess of Brabant; Jonkvrouwe Alexandra Jankovich de Jeszenice; Prince Friso of Orange-Nassau; Juan Zorreguieta and Jonkheer Frans Ferdinand de Beaufort.

Prince Friso and Princess Mabel =

Countess Luana = Prince Constantijn of the Netherlands, Eveline Wisse Smit, Baroness Sophie von der Recke and Emma Bonino.

Countess Zaria = Willem-Alexander, Prince of Orange, her uncle Prince Jaime of Bourbon-Parma, a first cousin of her father. Nicoline Wisse Smit her aunt. Ruben Ameling, a friend of her parents. Maria Luz Luano, a friend of her parents.

Prince Constantijn & Princess Laurentien =

Countess Eloise = Haakon, Crown Prince of Norway, Prince Friso of Orange-Nassau, Princess Carolina of Bourbon-Parma, and Sophie de Wouw.

Count Claus-Casimir =

Prince Willem-Alexander of the Netherlands, Prince Maurits of Orange-Nassau, van Vollenhoven, Ed P. Spanjaard, Countess Tatiana Razumovsky.

Countess Leonore =

Princess Máxima of the Netherlands

Marius Brinkhorst (brother of Princess Laurentien)

Juliana Guillermo (cousin of Prince Constantijn)

Jean-Charles Count Ullens de Schooten

Denmark.

Crown Prince Frederik = Prince Georg of Denmark, Baron Maximilien de Watteville-Berckheim, Count Etienne de Laborde de Monpezat, Queen Anne-Marie of Greece, Grand Duchess Joséphine-Charlotte of Luxembourg, and Mrs Birgitta Juel Hillingsø.

Prince Christian = Crown Prince Haakon of Norway, his wife Crown Princess Mette-Marit, Crown Princess Victoria of Sweden, Prince Joachim of Denmark, Crown Prince Pavlos of Greece (Frederik's cousin, son of Queen Anne-Marie), Jane Stephens (Mary's eldest sister) and two friends of the couple, Jeppe Handwerk and Hamish Campbell

Princess Isabella = Crown Princess Mathilde of Belgium, Princess Alexia of Greece and Denmark, Nadine Johnston, Christian Buchwald, Peter Heering and Marie Louise Skeel.

Prince Joachim = Count Jean Baptiste de Laborde de Monpezat, Princess Benedikte of Denmark, and Princess Christina of Sweden.

Prince Nikolai = Crown Prince Frederik of Denmark; The Earl of Wessex, Peter Steentrup, his maternal aunt, Nicola Baird; and Camilla Flint

Prince Felix = Count Christian Ahlefeldt-Laurvig, Oscar Davidsen Siesby, Damian Sibley, his maternal aunt, Martina Bent; and Annick Boel.

Belgium

Prince Philippe = his paternal grandfather, King Leopold III of the Belgians and his maternal grandmother Donna Luisa, Princess Ruffo di Calabria.

Princess Elisabeth = Prince Amedeo of Belgium, her cousin, and Countess Hélène d'Udekem d'Acoz, her aunt.

Prince Gabriel = Baroness Maria Christina von Freyberg and his maternal uncle Count Charles-Henri d'Udekem d'Acoz.

Prince Emmanuel = Guillaume, Hereditary Grand Duke of Luxembourg, and his mother's sister, Countess Elisabeth d'Udekem d'Acoz

Princess Eléonore = Crown Princess Victoria of Sweden, Princess Claire of Belgium, and Count Sébastien von Westphalen zu Fürstenberg.

Princess Astrid = Prince Don Fabrizio Ruffo di Calabria and her aunt Grand Duchess Joséphine-Charlotte of Luxembourg.

Prince Amadeo = The Duke of Brabant and The Queen of Belgium.

Princess Maria Laura = Archduke Gerhard of Austria-Este and Archduchess Maria Beatrix of Austria-Este.

Prince Laurent = Don Bettino Rocasoli and Duchess Sophie von Arenberg

Princess Louise = Princess Margaretha von und zu Liechtenstein and Marie-Claude Solvay.
